scripts.build: npm run convert:guard && tsc && vite build
scripts.setup:env: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/setup-env.js dist/scripts/setup-env.cjs && node dist/scripts/setup-env.cjs
scripts.setup:env:deploy: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/deploy-env.js dist/scripts/deploy-env.cjs && node dist/scripts/deploy-env.cjs
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:5000 && npm run dev" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.build:full: npm run convert:guard && npm run build:backend && npm run build
scripts.build:production: npm run convert:guard && set NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:backend && npm run build
scripts.build:structured: npm run convert:guard && npm run build:backend && npm run build && npm run copy:data
scripts.copy:data: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/copy-data.js dist/scripts/copy-data.cjs && node dist/scripts/copy-data.cjs
scripts.build:integrated: npm run convert:guard && tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/integrated-build.js dist/scripts/integrated-build.cjs && node dist/scripts/integrated-build.cjs
scripts.build:safe: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/build-safety-manager.js dist/scripts/build-safety-manager.cjs && node dist/scripts/build-safety-manager.cjs
scripts.pm2:manager: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/pm2-manager.js dist/scripts/pm2-manager.cjs && node dist/scripts/pm2-manager.cjs
scripts.deploy:optimized: npm run convert:guard && tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/deploy-optimized.js dist/scripts/deploy-optimized.cjs && node dist/scripts/deploy-optimized.cjs
scripts.deploy:ec2: npm run convert:guard && npm run setup:env:deploy && npm run build:production && npm run pm2:start
scripts.deploy:ec2:with-conversion: npm run convert:guard && npm run setup:env:deploy && npm run build:with-conversion && npm run pm2:start
scripts.health:check: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/health-monitor.js dist/scripts/health-monitor.cjs && node dist/scripts/health-monitor.cjs check
scripts.health:monitor: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/health-monitor.js dist/scripts/health-monitor.cjs && node dist/scripts/health-monitor.cjs monitor
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:setup: tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json && cp dist/scripts/test-setup.js dist/scripts/test-setup.cjs && node dist/scripts/test-setup.cjs setup
